description: Explore the transformative potential of blockchain technology in healthcare by enhancing data security and interoperability. Understand the crucial role of venture capital, government support, and corporate investments in realizing this potential, and discover the current funding landscape, challenges, and future prospects.
keywords: blockchain, healthcare, data security, interoperability, venture capital, government support, corporate investments, patient data management, pharmaceutical supply chain, clinical trials, funding landscape
title: Funding Blockchain in Healthcare: Revolutionizing the Industry
